data.title: Great time with friends
data.text:
This was such a fun night with my friends.  We don't get together very often.  At first we just said we were going to lock ourselves in the room for an hour just to chat, lol.  However, curiosity got the best of us and we couldn't wait to solve the crime.  It's very challenging and you really have to pay attention to every hint.  It took us almost the full hour to get out.  
This is something I'd do with coworkers, couples, or as a family adventure.

data.title: Fun and Unique Experience
data.text:
We purchased tickets in advance, and had to choose between one of two rooms/adventures.  Having chosen the "P.I.'s Office," upon arrival we were given brief instructions by the proprietors and then locked in the room with other individuals for the activity.  Without any spoilers, the experience was essentially a one-room scavenger hunt, with clues leading to other clues and eventually the door key that allowed us to exit the room.

On the positive side, this was our first "escape room" type of experience and it was unlike anything else we'd ever done before.  It was thrilling and fun without being scary, and trying to work together with a group of strangers to solve puzzles added an extra layer of complexity.  The couple running the business were extraordinarily friendly and eager to discuss both the puzzles and the overall operation.

That being said, they also have room for improvement.  The audio equipment that is occasionally used to pipe clues into the room while the game is running is sub-par;
most of the time we found these clues to be inaudible.  We also anticipated a game that would include more logical problem solving and/or use of trivia-type questions; the game we experienced was almost solely a search for hidden objects/information, making success a somewhat random proposition.

Nevertheless, we had a very good time, and would not hesitate to return to try the other escape room offering at this location.

data.title: Had a blast!!
data.text: My husband and I did the PI investigation and even though we were total losers, we had so much fun.  Best $50 we have spent in a long time.

owner_response.author: Ryan H, Owner at Electric City Escape, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you so much for coming and we're all very glad you had such a good time!! thank you again!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Made it by one minute
data.text:
Teenage boys did the escape room from the P.I office.  If you call for clues (help) it costs you five minutes of time for each clue so you want to make sure you are really stuck.   Both boys said they had a lot of fun.  Got out with one minute to spare.

Tip:  this place is sometimes on Groupon.

data.title: Great time! DO IT !
data.text:
Great times with son and I, very well done....can't  stop talking about it...can't wait to go back...well worth the money.
Owners/designers wonderful people with great customer service !!  , made us feel welcomed....didnt  catch their names.

Alan and Marcus

owner_response.author: Ryan H, Owner at Electric City Escape, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you Thank you Thank you
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great visit
data.text: This was our first visit to any type of escape room. The staff was great. We had a great time and plan to attend again. We are also excited about some of the future plans at this location.

data.title: A MUST do!!!!
data.text: An absolute blast!!!! We had so much fun!!! Highly recommend this to everyone! Apparently you can also BYOB too!!!!!!!!

owner_response.author: Ryan H, Owner at Electric City Escape, responded to this review
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: We escaped !!
data.text: Amy and Ryan Hnat the owners are terrific. We had so much fun escaping from both the art gallery and from the private detective rooms. The rooms are well done!!

data.title: Different!
data.text: One of my buddies came to town for the weekend, I got a coupon for this place on First Friday so I decided to check it out. It was such a cool thing to do! I did the PI room and didn't quite make it out but I still had a good time! Hopefully I'll get out next time.

data.title: Interesting Date Night
data.text: I decided to take my girlfriend on a different kind of date, I heard about this place and decided to take her here. Great decision! We both loved it, It was a one of a kind night that got us working together! I would Highly recommend!
